repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Two notebooks documenting David Kalugin's work at the United States Post Office's Radio City Station in New York, NY.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: David Kalugin was a Mail Handler and later the Suggestions Control Clerk at the United States Post Office's Radio City Station in New York City.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two notebooks documenting David Kalugin's work at the United States Post Office's Radio City Station in New York, NY. Included are blank and completed forms, correspondence and memoranda, publications, and other printed material relating to Kalugin's work.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: David Kalugin Suggestion System Documents #5509. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
